column2: Harry Potter And The Philosopher's Stone
Harry Potter has never even heard of Hogwarts when the letters start

column1: dropping on the doormat at number four
ink on yellowish parchment with a purple seal
by his grisly aunt and uncle. Then
beetle-eyed giant of a man called Rubeus Hagrid bursts in with some
astonishing news: Harry Potter is a wizard
column2: and he has a place at Hogwarts

column1: School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. An incredible adventure is about to
begin! These new editions of the classic and internationally bestselling
multi-award-winning series feature instantly pick-up-able new jackets by

column3: to bring Harry Potter to the next

column1: generation of readers. It's time to PASS THE MAGIC ON .
